description.raw:
This pull request deprecates the built-in sdf parser and switches to using the sdformat package. This primarily involves changes to header files and CMakeLists.txt.

This pull request also refactors the `sdf::Element::GetValue*` functions to use templates, ie. `GetValueString` becomes `Get<std::string>`. This refactor touches many files. To see the diff without this refactor, I made a test branch [gazebo_1.9_smaller_diff](#!/osrf/gazebo/compare/gazebo_1.9..gazebo_1.9_smaller_diff) that has all the `GetValue*` functions changed. Using the [compare tool](#!/osrf/gazebo/compare/gazebo_1.9..gazebo_1.9_smaller_diff) shows a smaller diff.
description.html:
This pull request deprecates the built-in sdf parser and switches to using the sdformat package. This primarily involves changes to header files and CMakeLists.txt.

This pull request also refactors the sdf::Element::GetValue* functions to use templates, ie. GetValueString becomes Get<std::string>. This refactor touches many files. To see the diff without this refactor, I made a test branch gazebo_1.9_smaller_diff that has all the GetValue* functions changed. Using the compare tool shows a smaller diff.

title: Use external sdformat repository (gazebo_1.9 branch)
